- [ ] Vercel Preview renders correctly and matches intended changes

## How to Review
- Open the Vercel Preview link auto-attached to this PR
- Sanity-check affected UI flows
- (Optional) Compare before/after screenshots or behavior

## Notes
- Vercel Preview link is added automatically by Vercel on this PR
- Env vars (if relevant): `VITE_GEMINI_API_KEY` set in Vercel (Preview/Production)
